channel.title: Zerked V1
channel.description:
Hi, Back with another devolopment team request.
My base is CodeUsa for now, new to 508-525 so, starting with something easy.
My other projects I have gave my sources & clients to friends for them to use, I have moved on past delta, but even farther, onto 517's.
I am using a 508 loading 525 cache, (517).
[b][i][u]Want I'm wanting to do?[/u][/i][/b] I'm wanting to add projectiles to soulsplit. I'm wanting to add magic to npc's. I'm wanting to add all 23 skills. I'm wanting to fix summoning. I'm wanting to add full godwars (already added but for some reason they won't spawn?) I'm wanting to add morrigan's axe special and javelins. *ADDED* I'm wanting to add working autocast (NPC and PVP) I'm wanting to add completely new prayer books, not overrighted sprites.*Changed mind* I'm wanting to add highscores to forums.*changed mind* I'm wanting to perfect my economy ( perfect as far as I know except you can sell some command items)*FIXED* I'm wanting to add full td mapdata and prayer switches. I'm wanting to add full DUEL ARENA. I'm wanting to add Castle Wars, and Clan wars ( I have safe area on clan wars)*FIXED* I'm wanting to fix an emote that happens whenever you do damage on a player.*FIXED*
[b][i][u]What I've done? [/u][/i][/b]I have fixed up shops. I have perfected meele combat. PVP I have perfected range combat. PVP I have increased Blitz, Barrage, and Mismiac Barrage max hits. I have added full effects to all mismiac spells. I have decreased unnescary custom bonus's. I have perfected soulsplit forumula for meele. ( need range and mage ) I have added new monsters. All npc's have decent drops. I have perfected the freezing timers for barrages. I have added 6 skills, and coded them - some aren't able to work quite yet. I have perfected extreme potions and overloads. I have added all customs into the stores or drop database. Added duel arena database. Perfected Bounty Hunter.
I am Thomas, and I'm looking for some 517 devlopers
What can you code - Server or Client or Both: Name: Age: Experience: Any experience on other servers: What are you wanting to do to help the server: MSN:
Have any questions? Ask me at [email]pritchardthomas@yahoo.com[/email]

item.title: Zerked V1
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

Hi, Back with another devolopment team request.

My base is CodeUsa for now, new to 508-525 so, starting with something easy.

My other projects I have gave my sources & clients to friends for them to use, I have moved on past delta, but even farther, onto 517’s.

I am using a 508 loading 525 cache, (517).

Want I’m wanting to do?
I’m wanting to add projectiles to soulsplit.
I’m wanting to add magic to npc’s.
I’m wanting to add all 23 skills.
I’m wanting to fix summoning.
I’m wanting to add full godwars (already added but for some reason they won’t spawn?)
I’m wanting to add morrigan’s axe special and javelins. ADDED
I’m wanting to add working autocast (NPC and PVP)
I’m wanting to add completely new prayer books, not overrighted sprites.Changed mind
I’m wanting to add highscores to forums.changed mind
I’m wanting to perfect my economy ( perfect as far as I know except you can sell some command items)FIXED
I’m wanting to add full td mapdata and prayer switches.
I’m wanting to add full DUEL ARENA.
I’m wanting to add Castle Wars, and Clan wars ( I have safe area on clan wars)FIXED
I’m wanting to fix an emote that happens whenever you do damage on a player.FIXED

What I’ve done?
I have fixed up shops.
I have perfected meele combat. PVP
I have perfected range combat. PVP
I have increased Blitz, Barrage, and Mismiac Barrage max hits.
I have added full effects to all mismiac spells.
I have decreased unnescary custom bonus’s.
I have perfected soulsplit forumula for meele. ( need range and mage )
I have added new monsters.
All npc’s have decent drops.
I have perfected the freezing timers for barrages.
I have added 6 skills, and coded them - some aren’t able to work quite yet.
I have perfected extreme potions and overloads.
I have added all customs into the stores or drop database.
Added duel arena database.
Perfected Bounty Hunter.

I am Thomas, and I’m looking for some 517 devlopers

What can you code - Server or Client or Both:
Name:
Age:
Experience:
Any experience on other servers:
What are you wanting to do to help the server:

Have any questions? Ask me at pritchardthomas@yahoo.com
